title: Mills and River, Early Morning, Pittsburgh
credit_line: Gift of Mr. R. C. Ernst
provenance_text:
Aaron Henry Gorson [1872-1933]. Harry Eichlay, Pittsburgh [1]; Mrs. Sigwarthe, Pleasant Hills, Pittsburgh; Robert Brandegee as agent, Pittsburgh; R. C. Ernst, Pittsburgh, by 1973; gift to Museum, 1973. 
NOTES:1. Harry Eichlay was a gallery owner in Pittsburgh. It is unclear if this work was from his personal collection or for his gallery.

creator.death_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
